Body:
"""Test the tokenizer handles lowercase sentence start correctly."""
text = (
    'These regions are positive contributors to overall efficiency. van Westen et al. built on this by including data from 24 new sources.'
    )
sents = ['These regions are positive contributors to overall efficiency.',
    'van Westen et al. built on this by including data from 24 new sources.']
self.assertEqual(sents, self.ps.tokenize(text))
